data.text: @MayorGinther Idk maybe it's just me and nearly every medical scientist on Earth but cities with major airports probably shouldn't be lifting mask requirements just before the most heavily-travelled time of year when the pandemic clearly isn't over.

@MayorGinther So if a person is exposed to a household member with covid, then no mask? Masks no longer protect others?  No more testing unless sick?  No more contact tracing?  Science changed on Super Bowl Sunday.
